Gates of Epica

I worked on Gates of Epica as Technical Artist, writing tools and rigging characters. As this work was done at some point I also created a lot of environment models. These were mostly modular sets to be used by the level designers. Most assets are sculpted in ZBrush and textured in Substance Painter. The low poly models have been created in 3ds Max. I also created the shaders in UE4 that let the level designers paint moss, lava and snow on the models.

Type Client Work
Date 2017
Role Technical Artist 3D Artist
Developer InnoGames GmbH
Publisher InnoGames GmbH
Tools Unreal Engine 4 3ds Max Photoshop ZBrush Substance Painter
